about_the_game:
The RESONANCE OF FATE™/END OF ETERNITY™ 4K/HD EDITION - HIGH RESOLUTION TEXTURE PACK greatly improves the visual quality of characters and the environment. Experience the story of firearms and fate in a further polished, detailed world!
From the title screen of RESONANCE OF FATE™/END OF ETERNITY™ 4K/HD EDITION, select OPTIONS and open the Graphics tab. You will now be able to set the Texture Resolution setting to High.
Please make sure to have enough disk space to install the High Resolution textures. If you don't have at least 3GB of free space on your hard drive, the High Resolution option will not be selectable.
detailed_description:
The RESONANCE OF FATE™/END OF ETERNITY™ 4K/HD EDITION - HIGH RESOLUTION TEXTURE PACK greatly improves the visual quality of characters and the environment. Experience the story of firearms and fate in a further polished, detailed world!
From the title screen of RESONANCE OF FATE™/END OF ETERNITY™ 4K/HD EDITION, select OPTIONS and open the Graphics tab. You will now be able to set the Texture Resolution setting to High.
Please make sure to have enough disk space to install the High Resolution textures. If you don't have at least 3GB of free space on your hard drive, the High Resolution option will not be selectable.

fullgame.name: RESONANCE OF FATE™/END OF ETERNITY™ 4K/HD EDITION

name: RESONANCE OF FATE™/END OF ETERNITY™ 4K/HD EDITION - HIGH RESOLUTION TEXTURE PACK

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 - 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel core i3 2100 / AMD A8-6500
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT630 VRAM 512MB / AMD Radeon R7 250 VRAM 512MB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 67 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 10 (All 64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4670 / AMD A10-7850K
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX960 VRAM 2GB / AMD Radeon R9 380 VRAM 2GB and over
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 67 GB available space
